title: How to Start a Basketball League

steps.headline: Decide exactly what you want to do.
steps.description: Do you want it to be streetball? Or are you going to be in need of a gym?

steps.headline: Find a place to play.
steps.description: You should try to contact your county or city and ask them if you could use the local gym at your nearest schools. Usually they'll allow it.

steps.headline: Decide if you are going to have 1 division, or several.
steps.description: For example 7-8 year olds, 9-10 year olds, 11-12 year olds, ect.

steps.headline: Look for some volunteers who are also interested in what you are doing.
steps.description: try to get a minimum of 10. This will be your board.

steps.headline: You then are going to need to hold meetings and discuss what you are going to have to do.
steps.description: You do need insurance, so you need to vote on getting this done.

steps.headline: Create a website!
steps.description: You can go to eteamz.com and get a website at a very low cost that specializes in basketball websites or you can go to hometeamsonline.com. Create a free league at PlayerMania.com, it also allows your players to network.

steps.headline: Look for sponsors.
steps.description: Usually some of the parents of the kids have a business or something. Usually a local McDonalds or something will sponsor.

steps.headline: Hold a draft.
steps.description: Draft all of the kids onto a team. Hold a special date to do this. Make it fair, though.

steps.headline: Create a schedule.
steps.description: Usually schedule a minimum of 10 games in the season (such as once per Sunday and one during the week. Then you can schedule a tournament.

steps.headline: Look for a photographer.
steps.description: They will take the pictures of all of the teams. Parents will love this.

steps.headline: Look for some volunteers for referees.
steps.description: Or you can hire some. This will make the game more exciting.

steps.headline: Sell tickets, or free admission.
steps.description: Congratulations, you now have a basketball league!
